title: First win of the day mission not appearing after the Noxus icon mission occured :(
body: No happy Poro, my missions _aren't_ complete; I should have my first win of the day bonus available by now but it's no where to be seen ahhhh I need mah exp :(

replies.body:
Top right of the boards page or top left of the client. Yellow exclamation mark.

>First Win of the Day is temporarily disabled while we investigate some issues.
thx i was worried because i didnt get any new missions at all. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Hopefully they'll be back soon, but if you think something's is missing or disabled, that little notification is always the first place to check :)
Yeah. I didnt get the new Lunar Missions or the Noxus missions. As a Darius main, the latter is absolutely murdering me.

You should have gotten the Noxus mission as far as I know, but given the timezones from OCE to EUW it's possible it isn't/wasn't activated yet. The Revel missions are enabled with the event, so I imagine timezones apply there as well.
